import { Subject } from 'rxjs' import { Component, Output } from '@angular/core' @Component({ selector: 'app-header', templateUrl: './header.component.html', styleUrls: ['./header.component.scss'] }) export class HeaderComponent { @Output() clickMenuIconEvent = new Subject() onClickMenuIcon() { this.clickMenuIconEvent.next() } }
